issues.summary: FEAT: Add Google SSO login
issues.description: As a user, I want to sign up/in with my Google account. Needs OAuth 2.0 flow, FE button, and BE callback handler.

issues.summary: AUTH-101: Password reset token expires too quickly
issues.description: Our password reset tokens are set to expire in 10 minutes. This is too short for some email providers. Increase expiry time to 1 hour.

issues.summary: PERF: Add Redis caching to main dashboard queries
issues.description: The 4 main queries for the dashboard are slow. Implement a 5-minute cache in Redis for this data to speed up initial load times.

issues.summary: REFACTOR: Migrate auth service from sessions to JWT
issues.description: Refactor the main authentication service to use stateless JWTs instead of stateful database sessions. This will improve scalability.

issues.summary: Q4 2025: Authentication Revamp
issues.description: Full overhaul of the auth system, including MFA, SSO, and social logins.

issues.summary: OPS-604: Kubernetes liveness probe failing intermittently
issues.description: The 'tasks-service' pod is restarting every few hours because its liveness probe (GET /healthz) is timing out.

issues.summary: FEAT: Add 'Login with GitHub' option
issues.description: Similar to Google SSO, implement a new OAuth flow for GitHub login.

issues.summary: TECH-DEBT: Migrate dashboard charts from Chart.js to D3
issues.description: Our current Chart.js implementation is not flexible enough. We need to migrate all 5 dashboard charts to D3.js to allow for more customization.

issues.summary: PERF: Optimize /api/projects/all query
issues.description: The 'GET /api/projects/all' endpoint is loading all tasks and comments for every project, causing massive N+1 query problems. Refactor to only return project-level data.

issues.summary: UI-FIX: Login button text overflows on mobile (Safari)
issues.description: On Safari on iOS, the 'Login with Google' button text wraps to a new line, breaking the UI. This is a CSS issue. The 'min-width' property needs to be adjusted.

issues.summary: FEAT: Add @mentions in task comments
issues.description: As a user, when I write a comment on a task, I want to be able to type '@username' to mention another user and send them a notification.

issues.summary: EMAIL-701: Welcome email is not being sent to new users
issues.description: The 'send_welcome_email' background job is failing silently. Checked Sidekiq logs and it seems to be an invalid SendGrid API key.

issues.summary: FEAT: Implement public API key generation
issues.description: Allow users to generate, view, and revoke API keys from their account settings page. Keys should be stored securely (hashed).

issues.summary: API-301: Add rate limiting to all public API endpoints
issues.description: Implement IP-based rate limiting (100 requests/minute) for all v1 public API endpoints to prevent abuse.

issues.summary: API-302: 500 error when POSTing to /api/tasks with null title
issues.description: If a client sends '{"title": null}' to the create task endpoint, the backend throws a 500 Internal Server Error (database constraint violation). Add proper request validation.

issues.summary: FEAT: Create new v1/webhooks endpoint
issues.description: As an admin, I want to be able to configure webhooks that fire when a task is completed. The endpoint should accept a URL and an auth secret.

issues.summary: DOCS: Write official documentation for Public API v1
issues.description: Our new public API is live but has no documentation. Write comprehensive docs using Swagger/OpenAPI for all v1 endpoints.

issues.summary: API-303: Pagination 'next_page_token' is incorrect
issues.description: The pagination cursor returned in the API response is not correct, leading to an infinite loop when clients try to paginate through large result sets.

issues.summary: FEAT: Implement Slack integration for new task notifications
issues.description: As a user, I want to connect my Slack workspace to get a notification in a channel every time a new task is created in my project.

issues.summary: FEAT: Integrate Stripe for monthly/annual subscriptions
issues.description: Integrate Stripe checkout and webhooks to handle new subscriptions, renewals, and cancellations for our 'Pro' and 'Enterprise' plans.

issues.summary: BILL-401: Prorated subscription calculation is incorrect
issues.description: When a user upgrades from 'Pro' monthly to 'Pro' annual, the prorated credit is calculated incorrectly, overcharging the user.

issues.summary: FEAT: Add ability to download past invoices as PDF
issues.description: Users on a paid plan should see a 'Billing History' tab in their settings and be able to download all past invoices as PDFs (using Stripe's hosted invoices).

issues.summary: BILL-402: Set up Stripe webhook listener for failed payments
issues.description: Implement the backend webhook listener for 'invoice.payment_failed' events. We need to notify the user via email and update their account status.

issues.summary: FEAT: Add 'Cancel Subscription' flow
issues.description: As a user, I want to be able to cancel my paid subscription from my account settings. This should trigger a 'cancellation' flow and notify the backend.

issues.summary: OPS-601: Migrate Docker base image from Alpine to Debian-slim
issues.description: The current Alpine-based Docker image is causing DNS resolution issues in our k8s cluster. Migrate all services to a 'debian-slim' base image.

issues.summary: OPS-602: Set up CI/CD pipeline for frontend (Vercel)
issues.description: Configure the frontend (Next.js) project to automatically build and deploy to Vercel on every merge to 'main' and 'staging' branches.

issues.summary: PERF: Add CDN for static assets
issues.description: Our JS and CSS bundles are being served from our main web server. We need to configure them to be served from a CDN (like CloudFront) to improve load times globally.

issues.summary: OPS-606: Automate SSL certificate renewal
issues.description: The SSL certs for our subdomains are being renewed manually. Set up cert-manager in Kubernetes to automate this process using Let's Encrypt.

issues.summary: PROD-500: Critical crash on user profile update
issues.description: Receiving a null pointer exception (NPE) in user_service.go on line 142 when a user with an existing avatar tries to update their profile without uploading a new one. The 'avatar_url' field in the payload is null, but the code expects a string.

issues.summary: Add pagination to the 'All Projects' list
issues.description: The 'All Projects' page loads all 500 projects at once. This is causing slow load times and crashes. Implement server-side pagination (25 per page).

issues.summary: COM-801: Markdown rendering broken in comments
issues.description: When a user posts a code block (```) in a comment, the markdown rendering breaks and shows raw HTML. This is a problem with our 'react-markdown' library.

issues.summary: UX: Add confirmation modal before deleting a task
issues.description: Right now, clicking 'Delete Task' immediately deletes it. This is dangerous. Add a confirmation modal ('Are you sure you want to delete this task?') first.

issues.summary: DOCS: Write 'Getting Started' guide for new users
issues.description: Create a new 5-step 'Getting Started' guide for the documentation site that walks a new user through creating a project, adding tasks, and inviting teammates.

issues.summary: PERF: 'Search' endpoint is vulnerable to ReDoS
issues.description: The regex used in the main search endpoint is inefficient and can be exploited for a ReDoS (Regular Expression Denial of Service) attack. Need to rewrite the regex.

issues.summary: REFACTOR: Remove jQuery from frontend codebase
issues.description: Our frontend still has jQuery as a dependency for a few old scripts. We need to refactor these scripts to use modern vanilla JS ('fetch' instead of '$.ajax') and remove jQuery completely.

issues.summary: ACC: Improve keyboard navigation in modal
issues.description: The new 'Create Task' modal does not trap focus, making it inaccessible for keyboard-only users. Need to implement a focus trap.

issues.summary: DATE-901: Due date picker showing wrong month
issues.description: When opening the due date picker in December, it sometimes incorrectly defaults to showing January of the *same* year, not the next year.

issues.summary: FEAT: Add 'Assignee' field to tasks
issues.description: As a PM, I want to be able to assign a task to a specific user in the project.

issues.summary: PERF: Large file uploads are timing out
issues.description: Trying to upload a file > 50MB as a task attachment is hitting a 30-second timeout on our load balancer. We need to implement chunked/multipart uploads directly to S3.

issues.summary: UX: Add 'Copy Task URL' button
issues.description: Add a small 'copy link' icon button to the task modal that copies the direct URL for that task to the user's clipboard. This is a small but high-value UX win.
